Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

Lagrangian Interpolator Filter

Discussion

This filter is used to resample the frequency of a sample much more cleanly than the default Miles resampler. It is commonly used with the voice chat system so that the 8000 Hz input sounds better when played back at 44100 Hz, but it can be used whenever you want resampled playback to sound better.

This filter doesn't have any preferences.


Group: Digital Filter Services
